name: GEAR CD Disc Image
summary: An MD1 file is a CD-ROM Mode 1 (MD1) disc image created by GEAR Software GEAR PRO disc-burning software. It contains a copy of a CD saved in the Mode 1 layout, which includes tracks subdivided into blocks containing header information, and 2048 bytes of data per sector. GEAR PRO users typically save data CD images as MD1 files.
